title: Kolkata to Darjeeling Hill Retreat
overview: Wake up to the view of Kanchenjunga and enjoy the world-famous Darjeeling tea in the Queen of Hills.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bagdogra
itinerary.desc: Transfer to Darjeeling, evening at Mall Road.

itinerary.title: Tiger Hill & Local
itinerary.desc: Early morning sunrise, visit Ghoom Monastery.

itinerary.title: Mirik Excursion
itinerary.desc: Day trip to Mirik lake and Nepal border.

itinerary.title: Tea Gardens
itinerary.desc: Visit Happy Valley Tea Estate and Zoo.
